channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 07:42 The threat of shelling! Now in the Bilenkovsky territorial community artillery shelling. Put in shelter!
item.description: 游댮 07:42 The threat of shelling! Now in the Bilenkovsky territorial community artillery shelling. Put in shelter!#Bilenkovskaya_ territorial This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
